[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_btn title=”Download Latest Version (v.3.1.0)” style=”classic” color=”sky” size=”lg” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-download” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmoonshine-ide.com%2Fdownloads%2Fmsdki%2Fmacos%2FMoonshineSDKInstaller-3.1.0.pkg title:Download%20Moonshine%20App%20Store%20Helper   ”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The App Store version of Moonshine does not include the Apache® Flex or Royale SDKs. In order to make it easier for you to setup the required SDKs, we created the Moonshine App Store Helper application.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Instructions:” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]
  1. Download and install the application from the link above. Moonshine App Store Helper will open automatically when the installation completes
  2. Review the license agreements by clicking the link, and click the checkbox to accept the agreement.
  3. Click “DOWNLOAD & INSTALL”
  4. Wait for the process to complete. This may take a few minutes.

 

You can also download previous version, which will download older versions of the SDKs. You should only use these if you have installed an older version of
